endings.description: Thunder and dew alike are signs of divine favor; a suspicious emperor trusts only two kinds of people: the simple-minded who lack cunning, and the forthright who speak without guile
endings.help:
[Prologue] Two approaches → Act according to Minister Xie’s suggestion
[Prologue] Relationship with Yu Gong → There is some private acquaintance
[Prologue] Presence at the scene → Present
[Prologue] Reason for sparing Yu Gong → I wanted to catch more traitors
*Not the only way to clear the game; explore other approaches yourself
endings.title: The emperor's will is hard to predict

endings.description: If Wan'er gets anxious, you'll have no way out
endings.title: Sudden disaster

endings.description: Destiny calls—you are the Chosen One!
endings.title: The Chosen One

endings.description: Every decision here rests in your hands. Try to discern your father's thoughts—speak what he wishes to hear, act as he expects you to
endings.title: Attain enlightenment and become immortal

endings.description: If it benefits my country, I would give my life — how could I choose to avoid it because of personal weal or woe
endings.title: My surname is Sikong

endings.description: Emotion, too, is a form of power play. Bowing appropriately now may very well be the patience that fuels your future resurgence
endings.help:
[Prologue] Prince Ning’s warning → I never intended to contend with my elder brother
[Chapter 1] The Empress’s pastry → Elder brother, you have worked hard these years; please have some
[Chapter 1] Falling into prison → Silent
[Chapter 1] Sikong Zheng’s framing → Brother, do you think I would do such a thing?
[Chapter 1] Chance to clear your name → Brother, please spare me this once
*Not the only way to clear the game; explore other approaches yourself
endings.title: Dwindling imperial heirs

endings.description: Hint: Try returning to the Prologue and rewrite Guo Xuan's fate
endings.title: Even I, the emperor, have greed?

endings.description: I suspect you have a brother named Smoking Ascendancy
endings.help:
[Prologue] The Emperor’s gambit → Lose this game
[Prologue] Elder brother who erred → Reduce his privileges and order him to make amends
[Chapter 1] An arriving army → Lay down arms and surrender
[Chapter 1] A word from your son → I will support my elder brother and yield the way to him
[Chapter 1] Why mobilize the troops → I have a selfish motive
*Not the only way to clear the game; explore other approaches yourself
endings.title: Decipher the emperor's will

endings.description:
Had Guo Xuan lived, today's outcome might have been different.
Hint: Try returning to the [Prologue] and rewrite Guo Xuan's fate
endings.help:
[Prologue] The scapegoat → Expose her intentions
[Prologue] The pawn seeking rescue → Save Guo Xuan
[Chapter 1] The path to break the stalemate → The Empress
endings.title: The Butterfly Effect

endings.description: If Wan'er panics, you panic too
endings.title: Such is fate

endings.description: our martial arts skills could use some honing
endings.title: Swords and spears have no eyes

endings.description: Battles cannot be fought with solitary courage alone — it would be wise to find a way to join forces with seasoned veterans
endings.help:
If you do not give Xie Ruoyu the jade comb, the branching scene is triggered from Chapter 2 “How many taels?”
[Chapter 2] Zu Yue’s challenge → Spar with Zu Yue to demonstrate your skill and defeat him
[Chapter 2] Discussion of the northern campaign → Whether to launch a northern campaign is already settled in His Majesty’s mind
[Chapter 2] The crux of the northern campaign → With your elder brother present, such a thing likely would not happen
[Chapter 2] Responsibility for defeat → In my view, our dynasty will not be defeated
*Not the only way to clear the game; explore other approaches yourself
endings.title: Lone Brave

endings.description: In war, all is fair — deception is never despised
endings.title: The Imperial Seal of a fallen dynasty

endings.description: War is cruel. Ten deaths are a number; a hundred thousand deaths are also a number — and you must face them with a cold heart to make decisions
endings.title: He's a real man

endings.description: To fall before his triumph was won— / Has left a wound in all hearts under sun.' A daring raid with a hundred riders is no feat just anyone can achieve
endings.help:
[Chapter 3] Wu Pu’s main force → East
[Chapter 3] Night attack arrangements → Send Zhu Yuanzhi
endings.title: Poor judgment in appointments

endings.description: In turbulent times, human hearts are hard to fathom — it is always wise to tread with caution
endings.title: Seditious schemes of spies

endings.description: In turbulent times, human hearts are hard to fathom — it is always wise to tread with caution
endings.title: Meet one's end due to carelessness

endings.description: Endure humiliation without surrender. Survive in obscurity while awaiting opportunity — bide your time with patience, and let death, if it comes, proclaim your resolve
endings.help:
[Chapter 3] Wu Pu’s main force → East
[Chapter 3] Night attack arrangements → Send Zhu Yuanzhi
endings.title: Emperor Wu of Xuan

endings.description: All is fair in war, yet careful thought remains essential
endings.title: A sudden backward thrust

endings.description: Fear not being outnumbered, but fear the collapse of morale
endings.title: The Carefree Prince

endings.description: Two legs, after all, can never outrun four
endings.title: Frequent Running Champion

endings.description: All provisions have been transferred to the storehouses south of the city
endings.title: A fire broke out in the southern part of the city

endings.description: Your martial skills require further refinement
endings.title: Unskilled in martial arts

endings.description: At this critical moment, after much deliberation, Liu Dadao still finds you untrustworthy
endings.help:
[Chapter 3] Suspicion of the militia → Today the people of Wu Pu did not launch an attack
[Chapter 3] Acceptance of the militia → Order the militia to break formation and place their divisions under our officers’ control
[Chapter 4] Left short, right lacking → Immediately send reinforcements to the southern city
endings.title: Better you than me

endings.description: Having signed the military pledge, there is no turning back
endings.title: The fault lies with this subject

endings.description: Wait, Shi Lang is tougher than expected
endings.title: Outmatched in skill

endings.description: Your martial skills require further refinement
endings.title: Less skilled

endings.description: Your martial skills require further refinement
endings.title: Showy but impractical martial arts skills

endings.description: Your martial skills require further refinement
endings.title: The longer the weapon, the greater the advantage

endings.description: Even good deeds may go uncredited—let alone misdeeds
endings.title: So close, yet so far

endings.description: Your martial skills require further refinement
endings.title: Backed the wrong horse

endings.description: You know there are tigers in the mountains, yet you insist on going?
endings.title: Brotherly affection and respect

endings.description: Can eternal slumber underground also be considered a form of 'long life'?
endings.title: A fleeting illusion

endings.description: Achieving great deeds requires favorable timing, geographical advantage, and popular support. You must pay attention to the timing
endings.title: Act rashly and alert the enemy

endings.description: In some matters, either don't act, or act decisively without leaving room for recourse. There can only be one Crown Prince in this world
endings.title: Hesitation leads to defeat

endings.description: Lack of patience in small matters can ruin great plans
endings.title: Refuse to collaborate with

endings.description: Shi Lang does business with you, but you treat Shi Lang as a brother
endings.title: Money is no issue

endings.description: Shi Lang knows the days ahead will be difficult, but you have no 'days ahead' to speak of
endings.title: Negotiations broke down

endings.description: Cao Biaozhi secured the realm with a single arrow
endings.title: A single arrow decides the victory

endings.description: He loved his realm, but loved his beauty even more. From then on, the empire was divided into three, and who would ultimately emerge victorious remained unknown.
endings.title: The wheel of history turns

endings.description: Your prestige within the army is insufficient
endings.help:
[Chapter 3] Request to enter the city → Let him into the city
[Chapter 3] The imperial jade seal → Host a banquet to receive it
[Chapter 3] Northward and return south → When did I ever say I would trade with Shi Lang?
[Chapter 5] Heaven’s mandate is with me → The treacherous minister Chen Dao deceived the sovereign; he must be purged and the court must rise against him
[Chapter 5] Breaching the city → Flood the city by diverting water
[Chapter 5] Evidence of collusion with the enemy → Burn it
*Not the only way to clear the game; explore other approaches yourself
endings.title: Divide and conquer

endings.description: He who strikes first gains the upper hand; he who delays is controlled by others
endings.title: Surrounded and annihilated

endings.description: A sincere heart is truly precious, but that's not what the Chen family wants
endings.title: Emperor Min of Xuan

endings.description: Lost in an endless dream, reveling in fleeting pleasures
endings.title: Emperor You of Xuan

endings.description: Wine is a poison that corrodes the gut; lust is a blade that scrapes the bone
endings.title: Emperor Zong of Xuan

endings.description: The fortune-teller said General Zhu bears the divine aura of kingship
endings.help:
[Chapter 6] Request to grant a teacher → Approved
[Chapter 6] The overbearing general → Heavily reward Zhu Yuanzhi
[Chapter 6] Rumors in the streets → Find that fortune-teller
[Chapter 6] Employing people → Let Zhu Yuanzhi continue to lead the troops
endings.title: The Imperial Star grows dim

endings.description: Why did Sikong Zheng fail? Was it not because his heart was too soft.
endings.help:
[Chapter 5] Winners and losers → Bring Sikong Zheng down
[Chapter 5] Disposal → From now on, do not let me see him again
*Not the only way to clear the game; explore other approaches yourself
endings.title: Emperor Fei of Xuan

endings.description: Either negotiate with your fists, or listen to the nobles set the terms
endings.title: Emperor Shang of Xuan

endings.description: Long I know in death all turns to dust, yet grieve not to see our lands unite
endings.help:
[Chapter 6] Visit the Marquis of Yongning → Nothing important; he said it was only family matters
[Chapter 6] Counsel → Ruolan is a hero of Da Xuan
[Chapter 6] Reform obstructed → Grant Xie Xuan Shangfang’s precious sword
endings.title: Emperor Huai of Xuan

endings.description: The Son of Heaven guards the nation's gates; the sovereign dies for the ancestral altars
endings.help:
[Chapter 6] Visit the Marquis of Yongning → Nothing important; he said it was only family matters
[Chapter 6] Counsel → Ruolan is a hero of Da Xuan
[Chapter 6] Reform obstructed → Grant Xie Xuan Shangfang’s precious sword
endings.title: Emperor Ai of Xuan

endings.description: When the imperial army reclaims the heartland, do not forget to tell your father at the family shrine
endings.title: Emperor Kang of Xuan

endings.description: He who underestimates the enemy meets defeat; he who fears the enemy faces destruction
endings.title: The tides of war have shifted once again

endings.description: Unless resolved to fight with your back to the river, do not burn your boats behind you
endings.title: Emperor Zhuang of Xuan
